nodes.bodyText: -- End of API-MGT Tables -- comment should come to the end. also, add a new line to the end of the file
shall we rename to ENDPOINT_REG_ENTRY. to avoid confusion with our registry  tables

     PRIMARY KEY(USER_ID)

+-- Create Endpoint Registry Tables --
+
+CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ENDPOINT_REG (

+  TENANT_ID INTEGER DEFAULT -1,
+  REG_OWNER VARCHAR(255),
+  READ_ROLE VARCHAR(20),
+  WRITE_ROLE VARCHAR(20),
+  UNIQUE (UUID),
+  PRIMARY KEY(ID)
+);

@@ -1803,4 +1803,35 @@ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS AM_USER (
     USER_NAME VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
     PRIMARY KEY(USER_ID)
 );
+
+-- Create Endpoint Registry Tables --
+
+CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ENDPOINT_REG (
+  ID INTEGER AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
+  UUID VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
+  REG_NAME VARCHAR(255),
+  REG_TYPE VARCHAR(20),
+  MODE VARCHAR(20),
+  TENANT_ID INTEGER DEFAULT -1,
+  REG_OWNER VARCHAR(255),
+  READ_ROLE VARCHAR(20),
+  WRITE_ROLE VARCHAR(20),
+  UNIQUE (UUID),
+  PRIMARY KEY(ID)
+);
+
+CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ENDPOINT_REG_ENTRY (
+  UUID VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
+  ENTRY_NAME VARCHAR(255),
+  SERVICE_URL VARCHAR(2048),
+  DEFINITION_TYPE VARCHAR(20),
+  DEFINITION_URL VARCHAR(2048),
+  METADATA BLOB,
+  SERVICE_TYPE VARCHAR(20),
+  API_DEFINITION BLOB,
